reviews.review: müq
Still an amazing game nearly 17 years later
A classic and the first game I played on PC. Still fun to play after all these years.

If there was a videogame that every gamer should be obligated to play in their lifetime, it's Half-Life 2.

Half-Life 2 is a game so polished, so brilliant, so ahead of it's time, that even coming to it today, it still looks amazing. From start to finish, all fourteen chapters of Half-Life 2 maintain a level of quality that games now should strive for. The characters are interesting, the plot is intriguing, and the occasional jank just makes the game even more fun.

I will admit, though, that the ending is a bit weak, but that is a hallmark of both the Half-Life series and Stephen King novels. The chapters Sandtraps and Entanglement are easily the worst, because they're forgettable and more of the same, but it's still better than half the uninspired crap most games today call a "campaign". As if the package wasn't sweet enough, the fact that it's so moddable means that an investment in Half-Life 2 is an investment in an almost countless amount of free mods.

In conclusion, Half-Life 2 is easily the most important game of all time.

Masterclass in getting the player to do exactly what you want them to, and making them think it was all their idea in the first place.

16 sene olmuş ancak hiçbir şekilde eskimeyen bir oyun. Silah çeşitliliği, vuruş hissi, puzzle türünde bölüm çözümleri, sürüş keyfi,  ilerleyen bölümlerde çevreyi cisimleri bölüm içinde aktif bir şekilde kullanabilme durumu ve her ne kadar yarım kalmış olsa da özgün hikayesiyle half life 2 günümüzde halen modern FPS oyunlarına taş çıkartacak durumda. Grafikler günümüz için aşırı iyi olmasa da hala göze hoş görünüyor özellikle o dönem için düşününce insan gerçekten takdir ediyor. Kesinlikle öneriyorum. Umarım VR teknolojisi daha erişilebilir duruma gelir ve Alyx oyununu da oynama şansım olur.

This game is one of the best ive seen from valve ive only played a bit but from that time i can already tell that it is a masterpiece. and may I add that this game runs 200+fps on my garbage 8 year old computer with no graphics card and only 7.4 gb of ram same with all of valves other games they all run upward of 200+ fps witch is truly phenomenal i would say this is one of the best games on steam next to Portal,Terraria,Garry's mod which are all great games that I love i recomend Half Life 2 and all other Half Life products
This game changed the industry forever and helped define what an FPS game could be. Must play if only for the Ravenholm level. There’s also like 10 hours of gameplay after that part.

This game puts storytelling to a whole other level.  It never takes you out of the first-person perspective and perfectly timed scripted events really immerse you into the universe that Gordon Freeman lives in.  This game's reputation is well deserved.

FPS계의 고전이자 현대 FPS의 효시격 되는 작품, 다른 최신 FPS와는 다른 정제된 게임디자인과 더욱 직관적인 컨트롤을 경험할 수 있다. 소스 엔진과 업데이트된 SDK 덕분에 그래픽 또한 2004년에 발매된 게임이라고 생각하기 힘들다. 이 고전을 사서, 쏘고, 달리고, 생각하라.
